features_page.title: Features
features_page.meta_description: Discover Infinity's four pillars: Smart Quizzes, AI Surveys, Micro-learning, and Gamification.
features_page.hero_title: Everything you need to stay ahead
features_page.hero_description: Four powerful tools to learn, prove, and grow.
features_page.quizzes_desc: Adaptive assessments that prove what you know.
features_page.surveys_desc: Identify your skill gaps with AI-powered assessments.
features_page.microlearning_desc: Bite-sized lessons that fit your busy schedule.
features_page.gamification_desc: Badges, tokens, and rewards that keep you engaged.
features_page.team_desc: Simple skill development for your entire team. No enterprise complexity — just results.

features_quizzes.title: Smart Quizzes
features_quizzes.meta_description: Adaptive quizzes that prove what you know — anti-cheating, leaderboards, and instant feedback.
features_quizzes.description: Assessments that adapt to your level and prove real knowledge, not rote memorization.
features_quizzes.benefit_1_desc: Questions adjust to your skill level in real-time, ensuring the right challenge every time.
features_quizzes.benefit_2_desc: Randomized questions, time limits, and integrity verification keep results trustworthy.
features_quizzes.benefit_3_desc: Track your progress and compare with peers through healthy competition.
features_quizzes.benefit_4_desc: Know immediately what you got right and why, so you learn from every attempt.
features_quizzes.benefit_5_desc: Earn verifiable proof of your knowledge to share with employers and teams.

features_surveys.title: AI Surveys
features_surveys.meta_description: AI-powered surveys that identify your skill gaps and create personalized learning paths.
features_surveys.description: Intelligent assessments that map your skills and guide your learning journey.
features_surveys.benefit_1_desc: Smart assessments that understand your strengths and pinpoint your gaps.
features_surveys.benefit_2_desc: Get recommendations tailored specifically to your needs and goals.
features_surveys.benefit_3_desc: Managers see aggregate skill data across the team to plan development.
features_surveys.benefit_4_desc: Reassess over time and measure your growth with clear benchmarks.
features_surveys.benefit_5_desc: Not just scores — get specific next steps to close your skill gaps.

features_microlearning.title: Micro-learning
features_microlearning.meta_description: Bite-sized lessons designed for busy professionals — learn in 5 minutes a day.
features_microlearning.description: Short, focused lessons designed for busy professionals who learn on the go.
features_microlearning.benefit_1_desc: Learn during coffee breaks, commutes, or between meetings — no long sessions needed.
features_microlearning.benefit_2_desc: Science-backed methodology that spaces reviews to make knowledge stick long-term.
features_microlearning.benefit_3_desc: Designed for learning on your phone, anywhere and anytime.
features_microlearning.benefit_4_desc: Build consistent learning habits with streak tracking and reminders.
features_microlearning.benefit_5_desc: No fluff — just the knowledge that matters most for your career.

features_gamification.title: Gamification
features_gamification.meta_description: Gamified learning with badges, tokens, and rewards that make skill development engaging.
features_gamification.description: Learning that feels rewarding — earn badges, collect tokens, and track your growth.
features_gamification.benefit_1_desc: Earn verifiable badges that prove your expertise and share them with your network.
features_gamification.benefit_2_desc: Collect tokens as you learn and track your engagement over time.
features_gamification.benefit_3_desc: Visual tracking of your entire learning journey with clear milestones.
features_gamification.benefit_4_desc: Build momentum with consecutive learning days and stay consistent.
features_gamification.benefit_5_desc: Unlock milestones that celebrate your growth and keep you motivated.
